document.full_text: by defeating manchester united, barcelona staked its claim to the most prestigious club title in the world and fueled a historical debate about whether it is one of the best teams in soccer history.
document.title: barcelona 3, manchester united 1 : prized possession for barcelona: champions league title
lines_and_colors: by defeating manchester united, barcelona staked its claim to the most prestigious club title in the world and fueled a historical debate about whether it is one of the best teams in soccer history.
